title: Target specification
description: Custom variables and configuration parameters necessary for building TARGET

sdk_name.description: name of the SDK being used (must be one of the supported values)

sdk_tag.description: The branch or exact tag to check out once the SDK has been cloned

external_toolchain.description: Does the sdk require an external toolchain for the build?

external_toolchain_URL.description: Where to download the external toolchain from, if 'external_toolchain' is True

build_artifacts_archive_name.description: The name of the .tar.gz archive containing the build artifacts, if saved. Do not specify the extension

description.description: a description of the instance itself

container_image_buildspec_file.description: Spec file for building container image (e.g. Dockerfile to build Docker image)

schema.description: relative path to the schema to use (this schema)

$comment: additionalProperties is true to allow for the use of '$schema' and annotations in the instance
